alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 15 at 4:58PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SUNDAY TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Pamlico and Pungo Rivers and adjacent tidal creeks, as well as areas along the Pamlico Sound. * WHEN...From 1 PM Sunday to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Several roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure will be inundated. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
